The professor is obviously more than qualified, he provides quality and detailed information. My only issue is that the content is more than any student can digest and the ppt is too cluttered so the main idea becomes hard to grasp.
很讚
尚可
老師教學認真，不吝於與學生交流彼此的想法。
以一堂三學分的通識來說課程要求與內容有點過多， 畢竟並非核心通識，在份量上需多斟酌
Students can make rapid progress in an full-English environment, but it can also be a hinder to those not having really good English. All in all, your class is really different and insightful.
能夠聽到前美國AIT處長親自授課是一件非常難得的事，在全英語授課環境下，討論的主題又如此深廣，因此修課學生大多都具有明顯高於平均值的能力，也讓我認識了好幾位志同道合的朋友，一起切磋努力變強。對於那些不害怕loading重的同學，這門課會是一個非常推薦的選擇。

The professor and TA are willing to listening to students' opinions, then providing some suggestions to help us brainstorm new ideas. The atmosphere in this class is pretty relaxed but knowledgeable at the same time~
本課程使我對國際局勢的思考方式有概略的認識與理解，對於未來從新聞媒體中理解與推導國際局勢非常具有幫助。課程後段的討論時段也使我獲益良多。課程上希望可以聽到老師更多的個人觀點，不需要用這麼多時間解釋數據佐證論點，不然有時候上起來會像高中地理課。

優點: 教授是經歷豐富的前外交官，課程內容分成區域介紹各地區的情勢與現況，讓我更有國際觀。課最後會有討論時間，讓我們深度思考問題。TA很認真! 
建議: The slides are full of information, but sometimes it's too full of information that I don't know where is the main point. Hope for regular recess during the class

Teacher Stanton is a very experienced ambassador, he gives really wonderful lectures, made us realize the "Big Picture" by telling us its strength and weakness throughout its history and geographical features.
老師是非常知名的外交官！能上到大師的課真的是榮幸，但才疏學淺，覺得老師上的內容真的偏難，英文又不是母語，有點小吃力。
收穫很多！

Learned a lot about how geographic features influence regional development, and it will be perfect if Professor Stanton could share more about his personal experiences as a US diplomat. Thank you Professor ;)
